values: When something is imperative, it is extremely important and must be done.
It was imperative for him to find a job.
n. 必要的事；命令；需要；规则；[语]祈使语气
adj. 必要的，不可避免的；紧急的；命令的，专横的；势在必行的；[语]祈使的
